timeline.message: add simple tests for sample app behavior
cover java-ish way to deal with server side errors

wip on server interceptor

runtime exceptions thrown during transaction are not properly handled
when such exceptions happen, there is no reported transaction
improve error message for easier debug
add address+port at once on destination

improve error message to help troubleshooting

This is quite common when we try to have an instrumentation that is an abstract class, thus making it obvious helps
provide better exception messages for known causes
fix port parsing with api from java9
fix port parsing with api from java9
minor (but essential) fixes from quick review
Felix was right about the order + assertions improve
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elastic/apm-agent-java into add-grpc-plugin
use helper manager + start context propagation

timeline.author: felixbarny

timeline.bodyText: how does that affect breakdown metrics? Seems related to #884
timeline.author: felixbarny

replies.bodyText: I don't really know how does it might impact breakdown metrics, maybe we could sync IRL on that ?
replies.author: SylvainJuge

replies.bodyText:
@felixbarny maybe we should probably add a comment that this method may have an impact on breakdown metrics ?
I've added this method just to factor-in some similar method calls (see next file in the review).
replies.author: SylvainJuge

timeline.author: felixbarny
felixbarny

timeline.bodyText:
We don't want to ship gRPC with our agent, just compile against it.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        <version>${grpc.version}</version>
          
          
            
                        <version>${grpc.version}</version>
          
          
            
                        <scope>provided</scope>
timeline.author: felixbarny
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,128 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>co.elastic.apm</groupId>
+        <artifactId>apm-agent-plugins</artifactId>
+        <version>1.13.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <artifactId>apm-grpc-plugin</artifactId>
+    <name>${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}</name>
+
+    <properties>
+        <apm-agent-parent.base.dir>${project.basedir}/../..</apm-agent-parent.base.dir>
+        <protobuf.version>3.8.0</protobuf.version>
+        <grpc.version>1.26.0</grpc.version>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <!-- our instrumentation depends on this -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.grpc</groupId>
+            <artifactId>grpc-api</artifactId>
+            <version>${grpc.version}</version>

timeline.bodyText: Cache Metadata.Key instances to avoid allocations.
timeline.author: felixbarny
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+/*-
+ * #%L
+ * Elastic APM Java agent
+ * %%
+ * Copyright (C) 2018 - 2020 Elastic and contributors
+ * %%
+ * Licensed to Elasticsearch B.V. under one or more contributor
+ * license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with
+ * this work for additional information regarding copyright
+ * ownership. Elasticsearch B.V. licenses this file to you under
+ * the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may
+ * not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+ * You may obtain a copy of the License at
+ *
+ *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+ *
+ * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+ * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+ * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+ * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permissions and limitations
+ * under the License.
+ * #L%
+ */
+package co.elastic.apm.agent.grpc.helper;
+
+import co.elastic.apm.agent.impl.transaction.AbstractHeaderGetter;
+import co.elastic.apm.agent.impl.transaction.TextHeaderGetter;
+import io.grpc.Metadata;
+
+import javax.annotation.Nullable;
+
+class GrpcHeaderGetter extends AbstractHeaderGetter<String, Metadata> implements TextHeaderGetter<Metadata> {
+
+    @Nullable
+    @Override
+    public String getFirstHeader(String headerName, Metadata carrier) {
+        return carrier.get(Metadata.Key.of(headerName, Metadata.ASCII_STRING_MARSHALLER));

timeline.bodyText: Cache Metadata.Key instances to avoid allocations.
timeline.author: felixbarny
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+/*-
+ * #%L
+ * Elastic APM Java agent
+ * %%
+ * Copyright (C) 2018 - 2020 Elastic and contributors
+ * %%
+ * Licensed to Elasticsearch B.V. under one or more contributor
+ * license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with

+ * ownership. Elasticsearch B.V. licenses this file to you under

+ * not use this file except in compliance with the License.

+ *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+ *
+ * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+ * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+ * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+ * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permissions and limitations
+ * under the License.
+ * #L%
+ */
+package co.elastic.apm.agent.grpc.helper;
+
+import co.elastic.apm.agent.impl.transaction.TextHeaderSetter;
+import io.grpc.Metadata;
+
+class GrpcHeaderSetter implements TextHeaderSetter<Metadata> {
+
+    @Override
+    public void setHeader(String headerName, String headerValue, Metadata carrier) {
+        carrier.put(Metadata.Key.of(headerName, Metadata.ASCII_STRING_MARSHALLER), headerValue);

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elastic/apm-agent-java into add-grpc-plugin
add test gRPC 1.22 + update protobuf compiler
use 'Abstract' prefix to avoid duplicate class
use junit DisplayName for better test naming
junit5 test name generator is great !
trying to make test less flaky
anticipate that startTransaction might return null
add client streaming on test app
ensure client streaming calls not instrumented
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elastic/apm-agent-java into add-grpc-plugin

add bidi + make test failures consistent

Yes, failure is an achievement here :-)
avoid non-unary method calls server-side for now
make async cancel test less flaky
Restore unreleased 1.15.0 section ID in CHANGELOG

timeline.bodyText: I restored the former section ID as it failed the docs build
timeline.author: eyalkoren

timeline.bodyText: I restored protected access, as it failed compilation
timeline.author: eyalkoren

timeline.message:
reset paused tracer after test execution

When a test pauses tracer, we need to avoid side effects on other tests.
Most of them assume tracer is not paused when starting state.
